text: The team classification in the Vuelta a España is a prize that is contested in the Vuelta a España. It has been awarded since the race's inception in 1935. ==Winners== {| |+Team classification winners |- |valign="top"| {| class="wikitable" border="1" !Year !Team |- | 1935 || Belgium |- | 1936 || Belgium |- | 1941 || Spain |- | 1942 || F.C. title: Team classification in the Vuelta a España
